channel.title: [PI][HELP] Client Loading || Logging In || Freezing [HELP][PI]
channel.description:
This what I get when my client is loading; [code]RS2 user client - release #317 java.lang.ArrayIndexOutOfBoundsException: 1 at Class36.methodCustomAnimations(Class36.java:65) at Animation.unpackConfig(Animation.java:1710) at client.startUp(client.java:7492) at RSApplet.run(RSApplet.java:33) at client.run(client.java:4686) at java.lang.Thread.run(Unknown Source) NPC.DAT : 1489108188 Called method225 NPC.IDX : 1489126980 Called method225 [/code]
This is what I get when I sign in, The whole client also freezes. [code] Error: T1 - 123,0 - 36,36 Exception in thread "Thread-5" java.lang.NullPointerException at client.drawHoverBox(client.java:960) at client.drawInterface(client.java:8589) at client.draw3dScreen(client.java:8962) at client.method146(client.java:12026) at client.drawGameScreen(client.java:8186) at client.processDrawing(client.java:8897) at RSApplet.run(RSApplet.java:108) at client.run(client.java:4686) at java.lang.Thread.run(Unknown Source) [/code]

item.title: [PI][HELP] Client Loading || Logging In || Freezing [HELP][PI]
item.dc:creator: @SacredHeart SacredHeart
item.description:
@SacredHeart wrote:

This what I get when my client is loading;

RS2 user client - release #317 java.lang.ArrayIndexOutOfBoundsException: 1 at Class36.methodCustomAnimations(Class36.java:65) at Animation.unpackConfig(Animation.java:1710) at client.startUp(client.java:7492) at RSApplet.run(RSApplet.java:33) at client.run(client.java:4686) at java.lang.Thread.run(Unknown Source) NPC.DAT : 1489108188 Called method225 NPC.IDX : 1489126980 Called method225

This is what I get when I sign in, The whole client also freezes.

Error: T1 - 123,0 - 36,36
Exception in thread "Thread-5" java.lang.NullPointerException
        at client.drawHoverBox(client.java:960)
        at client.drawInterface(client.java:8589)
        at client.draw3dScreen(client.java:8962)
        at client.method146(client.java:12026)
        at client.drawGameScreen(client.java:8186)
        at client.processDrawing(client.java:8897)
        at RSApplet.run(RSApplet.java:108)
        at client.run(client.java:4686)
        at java.lang.Thread.run(Unknown Source)

Read full topic
